publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4546 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Suspension of Standing Ordersâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, for the purpose of allowing up to 30 minutes to debate motion S2M-4538 on Thursday 15 June 2006, the second and third sentences of Rule 10.6.5 of Standing Orders be suspended. Supported by: George Lyon*
